metaTitle: 靠近（ Ⓝ ）图表和块附近的统计数据
metaDescription: Near提供了一套实时Near Ⓝ ）数据图表和统计数据，以跟踪有关Near Ⓝ ）加密货币的所有内容：价格，供应，市值，Netspace等。
heading: 近图表和统计
otherHeading: 其他近区块链图表和统计数据

NearPrice.metaTitle: 近（ Ⓝ ）今天的价格：信息，图表，统计接近区块
NearPrice.metaDescription: 接近每日价格（USD）图表显示接近美元的每日历史价格。所有数据都是实时，准确的，并直接从Near Ⓝ ）区块链中提取。
NearPrice.heading: 接近每日价格（美元）图表
NearPrice.description: 接近每日价格（USD）图表显示接近美元的每日历史价格。

supply.metaTitle: Near (Ⓝ) Total Supply and Market Capitalization Chart Near Blocks
supply.metaDescription: The table and pie chart shows the distribution of Near from reward of both block and uncle block mining to arrive at the current total Near supply. Near (Ⓝ) price in USD is also shown in the table below. With both the total supply of Near and the current price in USD, we can arrive at the market capitalization as shown in the pie chart.
supply.heading: Near Total Supply and Market Capitalization Chart
supply.description: The table and pie chart shows the distribution of Near from reward of both block and uncle block mining to arrive at the current total Near supply. Near (Ⓝ) price in USD is also shown in the table below. With both the total supply of Near and the current price in USD, we can arrive at the market capitalization as shown in the pie chart.

marketCap.metaTitle: Near (Ⓝ) Market Capitalization Chart Near Blocks
marketCap.metaDescription: Near (Ⓝ) Market Capitalization chart shows the historical breakdown of Near (Ⓝ) daily market capitalization and price. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Near (Ⓝ) blockchain.
marketCap.heading: Near Market Capitalization Chart
marketCap.description: Near Market Capitalization chart shows the historical breakdown of Near daily market capitalization and price.

netspace.metaTitle: Near (Ⓝ) Netspace Chart : History, Evolution, Growth Near Blocks
netspace.metaDescription: Near blockchain (Ⓝ) Network Space Chart or Netspace Chart shows the historical measure of the space allocated to Near blockchain (Ⓝ). All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Near (Ⓝ) blockchain.
netspace.heading: Near blockchain Space Chart
netspace.description: Near blockchain Space Chart shows the historical measure of the space allocated to Near blockchain.

NearSupply.metaTitle: Near (Ⓝ) Supply Chart : Circulating, Total, Pre-farmed Near Blocks
NearSupply.metaDescription: Near blockchain (Ⓝ) Supply Growth Chart shows a breakdown of daily block reward and the total Near (Ⓝ) supply. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Near (Ⓝ) blockchain.
NearSupply.heading: Near Supply Growth Chart
NearSupply.description: Near Supply Growth Chart shows a breakdown of daily block reward and the total Near supply.

txns.metaTitle: Near (Ⓝ) Transactions Chart : Info, Statistics, Growth Near Blocks
txns.metaDescription: Near (Ⓝ) transactions chart highlights the total number of transactions on Near blockchain blockchain with daily individual breakdown for estimated net space, average block weight, total blocks and total new address seen.
txns.heading: Near Daily Transactions Chart
txns.description: The chart highlights the total number of transactions on Near blockchain with daily individual breakdown for estimated net space, average block weight, total blocks and total new address seen.

blockRewards.metaTitle: Near (Ⓝ) Block Rewards Chart : Info, Stats, Evolution Near Blocks
blockRewards.metaDescription: Near blockchain (Ⓝ) Daily Block Rewards Chart shows the total Near supplied to Near blockchain. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Near (Ⓝ) blockchain.
blockRewards.heading: Near Daily Block Rewards Chart
blockRewards.description: Near Daily Block Rewards Chart shows the total Near supplied to Near blockchain.

blocks.metaTitle: Near (Ⓝ) Block Count and Rewards Chart Near Blocks
blocks.metaDescription: Near blockchain (Ⓝ) Block Count and Rewards Chart shows the historical number of blocks produced daily on Near blockchain and the total block reward. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Near (Ⓝ) blockchain.
blocks.heading: Near Block Count and Rewards Chart
blocks.description: Near Block Count and Rewards Chart shows the historical number of blocks produced daily on Near blockchain and the total block reward.

addresses.metaTitle: Near (Ⓝ) Unique Addresses Chart : Info, Stats, Growth Near Blocks
addresses.metaDescription: Near blockchain (Ⓝ) unique addresses chart shows the total distinct numbers of address on Near blockchain and the increase in the number of address daily.
addresses.heading: Near Unique Addresses Chart
addresses.description: The chart shows the total distinct numbers of address on Near blockchain and the increase in the number of address daily.

activeAddresses.metaTitle: Near (Ⓝ) Active Addresses Chart : Info, Stats, Activity Near Blocks
activeAddresses.metaDescription: Near blockchain (Ⓝ) Active Address chart shows the daily number of unique addresses that were active on the network as a sender or receiver. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Near (Ⓝ) blockchain.
activeAddresses.heading: Active Near Addresses Chart
activeAddresses.description: The Active Near Address chart shows the daily number of unique addresses that were active on the network as a sender or receiver.

txnFee.metaTitle: Near (Ⓝ) Transaction Fee History : Average Transaction Fee Near Blocks
txnFee.metaDescription: Near blockchain (Ⓝ) transaction fee chart shows the daily average amount in USD spent per transaction on Near blockchain (Ⓝ). All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Near (Ⓝ) blockchain.
txnFee.heading: Average Transaction Fee Chart
txnFee.description: The chart shows the daily average amount in USD spent per transaction on Near blockchain.

txnVolume.metaTitle: Near (Ⓝ) Transaction Volume Chart : Average Transaction Volume Near Blocks
txnVolume.metaDescription: Near blockchain (Ⓝ) average transaction volume chart shows the daily average amount in USD spent per transaction on Near blockchain including farming rewards.
txnVolume.heading: Average Transaction Volume Chart
txnVolume.description: The chart shows the daily average amount in USD spent per transaction on Near blockchain including farming rewards.

ⓃTib.metaTitle: Daily Near (Ⓝ) Farming Reward per TiB Chart Near Blocks
ⓃTib.metaDescription: Near blockchain (Ⓝ) Daily Ⓝ per TiB Chart shows the expected daily farmed Ⓝ per TiB. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Near (Ⓝ) blockchain.
ⓃTib.heading: Daily Ⓝ per TiB Chart
ⓃTib.description: The Daily Ⓝ per TiB Chart shows the expected daily farmed Ⓝ per TiB.

tibHrⓃ.metaTitle: Space Needed TiB To Farm Near (Ⓝ) Chart Near Blocks
tibHrⓃ.metaDescription: Near blockchain (Ⓝ) Daily TiB Hour per Ⓝ Chart shows the expected number of hours to farm 1 Ⓝ with 1 TiB. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Near (Ⓝ) blockchain.
tibHrⓃ.heading: Daily TiB Hour per Ⓝ Chart
tibHrⓃ.description: The Daily TiB Hour per Ⓝ Chart shows the expected number of hours to farm 1 Ⓝ with 1 TiB.
